game.name: Train Simulator: Long Island Rail Road: New York – Hicksville Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: America’s busiest, most historic, and legendary commuter railroad – the Long Island Rail Road – now comes to Train Simulator Classic! A trio of iconic New York City terminals (Penn Station in Manhattan, Atlantic Avenue in Brooklyn, and Long Island City), across “The Island” to Hicksville, New York.
